hypotheses.hypothesis: Duplicating the 'Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers' creative and targeting it to a similar audience will result in a comparable ROAS (above 20.0).
supporting_signals: High ROAS of 'Doctors recommend breathable modal — meet our men boxers' (50.91)
Top creatives significantly outperform average ROAS
ROAS ranges from 20.57 to 50.91 for top performing creatives

hypotheses.hypothesis: Replacing underperforming creatives (ROAS below 3), such as 'Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women panties.' and 'Breathable modal that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras,' with variations of the top-performing creative will improve overall ROAS.
supporting_signals: Low ROAS of 'Breathable microfiber that moves with you — limited offer on women panties.' (2.76)
Low ROAS of 'Breathable modal that moves with you — limited offer on women sports bras.' (0.67)
Significant difference between top and bottom performing creatives

hypotheses.hypothesis: Refreshing creatives that have high impression counts (e.g., 'Wire‑free ease, cloud‑soft cups — women sports bras that fits right.') with new variations will improve CTR and ROAS.
supporting_signals: High impression count for 'Wire‑free ease, cloud‑soft cups — women sports bras that fits right.' (6678048)
Decline in ROAS and CTR for creatives with high impressions

hypotheses.hypothesis: Increasing budget allocation to retargeting audiences will lead to a higher overall ROAS compared to broad or lookalike audiences.
supporting_signals: Retargeting audience has the highest ROAS (14.40)
Retargeting audience significantly outperforms broad and lookalike audiences

hypotheses.hypothesis: Shifting budget allocation to the US market will yield a higher ROAS compared to IN and UK markets.
Reallocating a portion of the budget from Instagram to Facebook will result in a slight increase in overall ROAS and CTR.
supporting_signals: Facebook ROAS (9.90) is slightly higher than Instagram ROAS (9.38)
Facebook CTR (0.0136) is slightly higher than Instagram CTR (0.0125)

hypotheses.hypothesis: Identifying and mitigating the causes behind significant daily ROAS fluctuations will reduce ROAS volatility and improve predictability.
supporting_signals: Unstable ROAS performance makes planning difficult
